vocabInfos.mediumDef:
Also named: ni.san (נִיסָן "Nisan" H5212)
§ This name is used for:
1) fresh, young barley ears, barley
2) month of ear-forming, of greening of crop, of growing green Abib, month of exodus and passover (March or April)
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a)   espigas (de grano); (b)   nombre del mes; pre exílico; marzo/abril
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 初熟清嫩的大麥穀穗
2) 穀穗形成的月份, 未熟的穀物的月份, 或亞筆月, 出埃及逾越節的月份 (三或四月)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 初熟清嫩的大麦谷穗
2) 谷穗形成的月份, 未熟的谷物的月份, 或亚笔月, 出埃及逾越节的月份 (三或四月)
